caption.p: ( a) Habitat suitability indices for the projected future distribution of Speyeria diana under the community climate system model (CCMA) and model for interdisciplinary research on climate (MIROC) representative concentration pathways (RCP) 4.5 climate change scenarios; ( b) habitat suitability indices for the projected future distribution of Speyeria diana under the CCMA and MIROC RCP 8.5 climate change scenarios.
